Class AttachmentViewUtils

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.attachments.v2.ui.utils.AttachmentViewUtils

public final class AttachmentViewUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility methods to assist with the running of the Attachments V2 Component.

nvl

public static java.lang.Object nvl(java.lang.Object value,
                                   java.lang.Object defaultVal)
Ensure that the value provided is not null and if it is substitute the default value.

Parameters:
value - the value to test.
defaultVal - the value to use if value is null.
Returns:
value == null ? defaultVal : value.

containsOrAll

public static boolean containsOrAll(java.lang.String valuesStr,
                                    java.lang.String value)
Determine if the value is contained within the valuesStr or valueStr only contains "all".

Parameters:
valuesStr - a space separated string of values.
value - the value to test for.
Returns:
true if all or valuesStr contains value.

containsOrAll

public static boolean containsOrAll(java.util.List<java.lang.String> values,
                                    java.lang.String value)
Determine if the value is contained within the values or the values list only contains "all".

Parameters:
values - a collection of values.
value - the value to test for.
Returns:
true if values == all or it contains value.

notEmptyContainsOrAll

public static boolean notEmptyContainsOrAll(java.util.List<java.lang.String> values,
                                            java.lang.String value)
Determine if the value is contained within the values or the values list only contains "all". If the list is empty then false will be return.

Parameters:
values - a collection of values.
value - the value to test for.
Returns:
true if values.size() > 0 and values == all or it contains value.

getLookupValues

public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getLookupValues(javax.el.ValueExpression attachmentModelEl,
                                                                                         java.lang.String voName,
                                                                                         java.lang.String defName)
For internal use only Retrieve the value from a lookup View Object. The View Object must have three attributes (LookupCode, Meaning, Language) where LookupCode+Language is the primary key.

Parameters:
attachmentModelEl - the expression which will provide the attachments model.
voName - the name of the View Object.
defName - the fully qualified definition name.
Returns:
The map of Lookup Code to Meaning in the current language.

getViewLink

public static oracle.jbo.ViewLink getViewLink(javax.el.ValueExpression attachmentModelEl)
For internal use only Retrieve the Attachments View Link from the attachment model supplied. The attachment view link will ensure that the view link destination name matches the binding -or- if there is only one view link that it is an attachments view link.

Parameters:
attachmentModelEl - the expression which will provide the attachments model.
Returns:
The attachment model view link. null if it cannot be determined.

getSourceAttributeName

public static java.lang.String getSourceAttributeName(oracle.jbo.ViewLink viewLink,
                                                      java.lang.String attachmentAttribute)
For internal use only Retrieve the name of the attribute in the source of the view link which matches the attachment (destination) attribute.

Parameters:
viewLink - the Attachments View Link.
attachmentAttribute - the name of the attachment attribute.
Returns:
the matching name of the attachmentAttribute in the source.

getDefaultValueOrFirst

public static java.lang.Object getDefaultValueOrFirst(java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> items,
                                                      java.lang.Object intendedDefaultValue)
Determine the default value to use from the list of items provided. Check to see if the intendedDefaultValue is in the list of selected item values and if so then use return it otherwise return the first value from the list.

Parameters:
items - the list of items to check against.
intendedDefaultValue - the value which is intended to be the default.
Returns:
the intendedDefaultValue or the first value from the list. null if empty list.

isUploadContentTypeAllowed

public static boolean isUploadContentTypeAllowed(javax.el.ValueExpression attachmentModelEl,
                                                 java.lang.String contentType,
                                                 java.lang.StringBuffer userContentType)
For internal use only Determine if the site permits uploads for the content type provided.

Parameters:
attachmentModelEl - the expression which will provide the attachments model.
contentType - the content type to test.
userContentType - out: the user value for the content type.
Returns:
true if the content type is allowed on the site. if not allowed the userContentType will be set.

checkMethodPermissionSecurityLocal

public static final boolean checkMethodPermissionSecurityLocal(java.lang.String methodName)
For internal use only Check access to invoke the Method in the local application Stripe.

Parameters:
methodName - to validate for.
Returns:
true if access if granted, false otherwise.

mapToSelectItemList

public static java.util.ArrayList<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> mapToSelectItemList(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> valueMap)
Converts a String-String map into a list of SelectItems.

Parameters:
valueMap - the values to convert.
Returns:
an array list of SelectItems representing the value map.

convertToInt

public static java.lang.Integer convertToInt(java.lang.Object value)
Convert the object provided into an Integer. If the value is null or is not a number then null will be returned.

Parameters:
value - the value to convert into an Integer.
Returns:
the converted Integer value or null.

getFirstValue

public static <K,V> V getFirstValue(java.util.Map<K,V> valueMap)
Retreive the value from the map first entry in the map as determined by the values iterator.

Parameters:
valueMap - the map to retreive the value for.
Returns:
the first value in the map or null.
